assignment.name: Basic Concepts : 4) Input / Add Three Numbers

files.name: main.py
files.content:
Firstnumber=input("Please enter a number:")
Firstnumber=int(Firstnumber)

Secondnumber=input("Please enter another number:")
Secondnumber=int(Secondnumber)

Thirdnumber=input("Please enter a third number:")
Thirdnumber=int(Thirdnumber)

Finalnumber=(Firstnumber+Secondnumber+Thirdnumber)

print(Firstnumber,"plus",Secondnumber,"plus", Thirdnumber,"equals", Finalnumber)
